title: Innovative chitin-glucan based material obtained from mycelium of wood decay fungal strains
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Dhanalakshmi Vadivel, Marco Cartabia, Giulia Scalet, Simone Buratti, Luca Di Landro, Alessandra Benedetti, Ferdinando Auricchio, Stefano Babbini, Elena Savino, Daniele Dondi
